snippet.title: Introducing PEWPEW! | PEWPEW Devlog #1
snippet.description:
Pre-Order: https://tristanstudios.itch.io/pewpew
Discord: https://discord.gg/dDv4bs4pVb

PEWPEW is a fun 2d platformer shooter game where you complete levels fight bosses and shoot up enemies with all different types of weapons. It's currently in development and I have lots of ideas for PEWPEW such as making an online multiplayer game mode. If you subscribe you can watch the development of PEWPEW come to life as I will be making weekly devlogs for you guys. You can join the Discord for updates on the game everytime I do something worth showing!

Discord: https://discord.gg/dDv4bs4pVb

Title: Introducing PEWPEW! | PEWPEW Devlog #1
 
Thanks for watching guys! These videos take me a long time to create and I try very hard to make the best quality content for you all, so if you could just drop a LIKE 👍🏼 on the video or maybe even consider SUBSCRIBING 😊 that would mean the world to me! 

► SUBSCRIBE HERE - https://bit.ly/39gXX5L
► SUPPORT ME - https://www.patreon.com/tristn


---------------------------------------------------------------- 
Bored? 😴 Why not check out some other videos I have made similar to this..

🎥 Video1 ➜ to be filled when i actually make more devlogs

🎥 Video2 ➜ to be filled when i actually make more devlogs

---------------------------------------------------------------- 

🌟 STAY CONNECTED (follow my other socials pls)

► Twitter: https://twitter.com/tristanstudios
► TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@tristanstudios
► Discord Server: https://discord.gg/dDv4bs4pVb

📧 Business Inquiries: tristancamejo@gmail.com
